2020.context: Payoneer Global Inc. is a cross-border payments platform focused on international payments for freelancers, SMBs, and marketplaces. SPAC merger. Cross-border B2B payments focus.

competitors.name: PayPal
competitors.notes: Dominant global payment platform with extensive cross-border capabilities, large user base, but higher fees for international transfers

competitors.name: Wise (TransferWise)
competitors.notes: Fast-growing cross-border payment platform using mid-market exchange rates with transparent, lower fees

competitors.name: Stripe
competitors.notes: Developer-focused payment infrastructure with growing cross-border capabilities through Stripe Connect

competitors.name: Airwallex
competitors.notes: Cross-border payment provider founded 2015, offering multi-currency accounts and international transfers

competitors.name: Tipalti
competitors.notes: B2B payment automation platform serving complex financial operations with higher fee structure

competitors.name: Western Union
competitors.notes: Traditional money transfer provider with extensive global network

competitors.name: Ant Group (Alipay)
competitors.notes: Major Asian payment platform with cross-border payment capabilities

2024.context: Payoneer Global Inc. is a cross-border payments platform focused on international payments for freelancers, SMBs, and marketplaces. Enterprise payments growth. Expanded currency support.

competitors.name: Wise (TransferWise)
competitors.notes: Leading affordable cross-border platform with mid-market rates, multi-currency accounts supporting 40+ currencies, transparent pricing model

competitors.name: Airwallex
competitors.notes: Melbourne-based (2015) serving 150,000+ businesses in 180+ countries, local accounts in 20+ currencies, interbank FX rates

competitors.name: PayPal
competitors.notes: Operates in 200+ markets, familiar brand with extensive reach, but higher fees and less transparent currency conversion

competitors.name: Tipalti
competitors.notes: Enterprise-focused payments to 200+ countries in 120+ currencies with 50+ payment methods, higher fees for complex operations

competitors.name: Revolut
competitors.notes: Multi-currency accounts with 25+ currencies, spending in 140+ countries, mid-market exchange rates, monthly fees $0-16.99

competitors.name: Stripe
competitors.notes: Developer-friendly platform with Stripe Connect for marketplaces and complex payment flows

competitors.name: Visa
competitors.notes: Global payment network competing in cross-border payment infrastructure

competitors.name: Mastercard
competitors.notes: Global payment network with cross-border payment capabilities

competitors.name: FIS
competitors.notes: Financial technology provider with cross-border payment solutions

competitors.name: Adyen
competitors.notes: Payment platform offering cross-border payment acceptance and processing

competitors.name: TransferMate
competitors.notes: B2B cross-border payments platform

competitors.name: PingPong Global Solutions
competitors.notes: Cross-border payment platform focused on e-commerce and marketplaces

competitors.name: Thunes
competitors.notes: Cross-border payments network

2025.context: Payoneer Global Inc. is a cross-border payments platform focused on international payments for freelancers, SMBs, and marketplaces. Global payments platform. Competing with PayPal, Wise.

competitors.name: Wise (TransferWise)
competitors.notes: Top affordable alternative with mid-market rates, 40+ currencies in multi-currency accounts, transparent pricing without hidden markups

competitors.name: Airwallex
competitors.notes: Comprehensive cross-border solution serving 150,000+ businesses globally, local accounts in 20+ currencies, competitive interbank rates

competitors.name: PayPal
competitors.notes: Operates in 200+ markets with MAS license in Singapore, familiar brand but higher fees especially on currency conversion

competitors.name: Tipalti
competitors.notes: Enterprise B2B payments platform supporting 200+ countries, 120+ currencies, 50+ payment methods, unified cloud platform

competitors.name: Revolut
competitors.notes: Business and personal accounts supporting 25+ currencies, spending in 140+ countries, mid-market rates up to limits

competitors.name: Stripe Connect
competitors.notes: Developer-friendly API for marketplaces and complex payment flows, strong integration capabilities

competitors.name: WorldFirst
competitors.notes: Cross-border payment platform offering competitive alternatives to Payoneer

competitors.name: Secret
competitors.notes: Among 20+ Payoneer alternatives in 2025 marketplace

competitors.name: Visa
competitors.notes: Global payment network infrastructure provider

competitors.name: Mastercard
competitors.notes: Global payment network with cross-border capabilities

competitors.name: FIS
competitors.notes: Financial technology and cross-border payment solutions

competitors.name: Adyen
competitors.notes: Global payment platform with cross-border processing

competitors.name: American Express
competitors.notes: Traditional payment network with international capabilities

competitors.name: PingPong Global Solutions
competitors.notes: E-commerce focused cross-border payments

competitors.name: Thunes
competitors.notes: Cross-border payments network

competitors.name: Tazapay
competitors.notes: Fintech enabling cross-border transactions in 173+ countries
